data.name: 老房子
data.detailed_description:
You are a mouse who finds a hole in the wall. When you enter carefully, you find yourself trapped in a strange house.

Now you'll try to solve the mystery of the house and, if you're lucky, take some food out for the winter.

"Old house" is a single third person puzzle game, there are a variety of decryption and gameplay in the game, open the door, cabinet, box..... 7 nodes, over 100 puzzles to explore and solve. The game is based on the decryption of Chinese tujia traditional culture elements, and is a multi-ending game, your decision will change the direction of the whole game.
data.about_the_game:
You are a mouse who finds a hole in the wall. When you enter carefully, you find yourself trapped in a strange house.

Now you'll try to solve the mystery of the house and, if you're lucky, take some food out for the winter.

"Old house" is a single third person puzzle game, there are a variety of decryption and gameplay in the game, open the door, cabinet, box..... 7 nodes, over 100 puzzles to explore and solve. The game is based on the decryption of Chinese tujia traditional culture elements, and is a multi-ending game, your decision will change the direction of the whole game.
data.short_description: A mouse found a gaping hole in the wall of a house, and crept carefully into it, expecting to find some food in the house to survive the winter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 780
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11.6 (El Capitan)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12.3 (Sierra)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 M370X
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
